sources.title: Pompeii : Secrets of the Dead
sources.description: "Pompeii: Secrets of the Dead" is a documentary that explores the catastrophic eruption of Mount Vesuvius in A.D. 79, which buried the ancient Roman city of Pompeii. This particular installment in the "Secrets of the Dead" series delves into the stories of a group of victims known as “the Fugitives.” The documentary utilizes forensic science to examine the remains of these victims, revealing crucial insights into their lives and circumstances at the time of the disaster.
